author: mmidy
msg: Bug 5505: Need to resolve params before we do anything else, so move code that does that above the code that sets up the different node stacks.

author: jkesselm
msg: Bugzilla 2617: Recreated missing code, changed controls to ensure
that this mode gets set early enough to be useful and can't be broken
by being turned on and off during execution.
NOTE: Current implementation relies on a global static flag in
TransformerFactoryImpl. We need to rearchitect our APIs slightly
so configuration hints of this kind can be passed down from top-level
objects to the back-end code more elegantly. Revisit in future

author: mmidy
msg: Bug 4987: Changed Apply-imports logic to only apply imports to stylesheets that are direct imports. The logic for includes has not changed, we will apply-imports to any stylesheet that is imported as a result of an inclusion. Note: had to change the order when includes and imports are recomposed!
